name: Dueltaining
text:
For each player, the first time they do each of the following per turn, they draw 2 cards.
â—? Special Summon 5 monsters with different Levels at the same time.
â—? 1 monster they control battles 5 times.
â—? Activate a card or effect as Chain Link 5 or higher.
â—? Roll 1 six-sided die, or toss a coin, 5 times.
â—? Take damage that made their LP 500 or less.
